list.name: getRecordIdsByVersion
list.sqlitem: select id from records where version = ? order by create_at desc

list.name: getAll
list.sqlitem: select id from records where 1 = 1 order by create_at desc

list.name: getRecordIdsByVersionAndCreateAt
list.sqlitem: select id from records where version = ? and create_at >= ? and create_at <= ? order by create_at desc
